boardgame.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shadows of the Past
boardgame.description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shadows of the Past is a scenario-driven campaign game that features story content from the IDW TMNT comic. One player takes on the role of the ultimate villain Shredder, while the others take the role of their favorite Turtle. The Turtle players battle their way through a series of 60-90 minute missions in which they develop their characters' strengths, fighting styles, and equipment along the way to create a lasting story arc. Fan-favorite characters like Casey Jones and Alopex appear throughout the missions as the Turtles call on their closest allies for help in battling their deadliest foes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shadows of the Past is a scenario-driven campaign game that features story content from the IDW TMNT comic. One player takes on the role of the ultimate villain Shredder, while the others take the role of their favorite Turtle. The Turtle players battle their way through a series of 60-90 minute missions in which they develop their characters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; strengths, fighting styles, and equipment along the way to create a lasting story arc. Fan-favorite characters like Casey Jones and Alopex appear throughout the missions as the Turtles call on their closest allies for help in battling their deadliest foes. This is the Kickstarter Exclusive The Works Pledge: The Works Edition Special Edition “Deep Dish Pizza” Board Game Box + Signed Kevin Eastman Lithograph, 3 Other Kevin Eastman Lithographs and Portfolio Case + Kevin Eastman Variant Turtles (Based on Original Comic Versions) + Splinter Hero Pack + Exclusive April Hero Pack + All Applicable Stretch Goals (including Kickstarter Exclusive Bebop, Rocksteady and Super Shredder Variant Minis, which is awesome and so much better then the original sculpt) Ok, so this game is huge! And the value is amazing, especially if you are a friend of the franchise. The Works exclusive content is amazing! Accept Paypal or IBAN with BIC. If you pay by PayPal, please send through friends or pay the fee for business transaction. Private Sale. The game is in Vienna. Please check out the Photos. Any questions just ask. You will only pay the shipping you want and need. But be aware, that the game is quite heavy.

Unplayed, only removed shrink wrap to check the inside. Cards still wrapped, tokens unpunched etc. Can send photos if needed. Shipping within Germany: EUR 5,-- (please ask for international shipping).

Game is in excellent condition. Barely played. Shipping from 95062. Box dimensions are similar to FFG large boxes, so shipping will probably be in the vicinity of $17-18 depending on your location and carrier.

INCLUDES BRAND NEW APRIL O_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;NEIL HERO EXPANSION PACK UK postage is about £5.99 Worldwide shipping available Game has a very light manufacturing crease on the top of the lid, otherwise in excellent condition.
Brand new, factory sealed. Buyer pays shipping costs from 05620 (New Haven, CT) It is a big box. Local pick up also available (West Haven / New Haven, CT)
Opened but unplayed. THE WORKS EXCLUSIVE TMNT: Shadows of the Past Kickstarter Exclusive Works Pizza Box + Exclusive April Hero Pack + Kevin Eastman-Style Miniatures + All Applicable Stretch Goals.
